EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Silicon Valley State of Mind Roundtable_Q415.Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at the Executive Luncheon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for attending our executive luncheon with Bill Cook and Gavin Jones on November 26. We hope that the roundtable gave you the opportunity to exchange ideas with your peers and explore how digital transformation is changing the way enterprise companies do business.
We invite you to learn more about Pivotal and how we are working to bring the Silicon Valley culture and mindset to enterprises located all around the world:
- How is software transforming businesses today? <http://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-labs/features/the-real-meaning-of-software-transformation-for-businesses-today> - Hear from Pivotal customers and how they are driving innovation <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5q-ntJOKYA4> - Learn how CoreLogic is delivering quality products and services at rapid speed <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_PWzVwytrX4>
Are you interested in a complimentary technical evaluation? Please email us and let us know.
Thank you again for joining us and we look forward to seeing you at our next event.
The Pivotal Team
